name: BACK TO EBATORIA
description:
History
BACK TO SAVELYEV - Vlad Saveliev, our main hero streamer from russia, returns to its origin, begins a full-fledged rout in his apartment.
In the game you can listen to key phrases by Vlad Saveliev, read rap, talk with Cyrillichem in skype and play mini-games where you need to evade hamburgers.

I do not advise you to buy this game if you are not from Russia and do not know this tape drive. the meaning of the game you will not understandВ BACK TO SAVELYEV you'll get:-Exciting gameplay.
-Hardcore phrases by Vlad Saveliev.
-Classic rap of Vlad Saveliev.
-Beautiful graphics.
-Excellent mini-games.
-Deep immersion in the history of the Russian streamer.
-Humorous communication with russian friend in voice chat.
-Various rooms.
-Achieving Steam
